T01n890u_001:3: tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva-
T01n890u_001:4: stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ |
T01n890u_001:5: tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ
T01n890u_001:6: tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ ||2 ||
T01n890u_001:10: annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 3 ||
T01n890u_001:11: pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca-
T01n890u_001:13: sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako'si
T01n890u_001:14: tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 4 ||
T01n890u_001:15: śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
T01n890u_001:17: dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
T01n890u_001:20: dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam || 6 ||
